column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////GLORIOUS ribeye.  Way too big for me (but I wanted the ribeye
column3: so I took the leftovers home
column4: cut it up into steak tips and used it in my arugula salads for the rest of the week.  So worth it.  Also
column5: you can add bone marrow to your steak for cheaper than the actual bone marrow dish.  Hooray!
